issue.title: [C++] Use simpler hash functions for integers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2211](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2211). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are using a relatively complex hash function on 32- and 64-bit integers. A simpler hash with fewer CPU instructions should be sufficient for our needs
